We don't have official support for C++ client. Currently, you can export a service with hessian/http protocol on server side, and then invoke this service using C++ client, but you cannot use the Service Discovery and LoadBalance feature provided by Dubbo.
@tuser4198 great work.
We recommend use english. In theory, you can set as many route rules as you can, and i don't think the execute order of route rules will make any difference?

By default, we provider three cache policies: LrcCache, JCache, ThreadLocalCache.

These policies do not support expire time yet, we recommend use your own cache policies by extend, and we will try to enhance this part in the future.

What's your dubbo version?
At 2.5.8, you can decide whether accept traffic coming from telnet port or not, click [here](http://dubbo.io/books/dubbo-user-book/references/qos.html) for more how to config.

We will remove the old telnet implementation in the future.

got it. we'll have a try on it. Thanks!

Have you used `Constructor Injection`? 
Maybe this post can help you http://www.baeldung.com/circular-dependencies-in-spring

Do you use dubbo Annotation in your project? I suspect it's a Spring related problem, may have nothing to do with dubbo, but i am not sure yet. Can you provide a runnable demo so we can figure out the problem?

echo status | nc -i 1 $SERVER_HOST $SERVER_PORT | grep -c OK

rh7/centos7自带的nc是nmap ncat，不是netcat。

-i参数在netcat中表示发送接收之间的间隔，但是ncat中表示idle-timeout，发送status之后ncat会立即读入EOF结束，不会再接收response，所以收不到OK。

改为 (echo status;sleep 1) | nc $SERVER_HOST $SERVER_PORT   可正常运行。

我不是太明白，是不是注册的地址要写本地的ip？我修改成本地ip也报错

我认为他的意思是用zk来开发太难了。

- zk实际本身对资源的消耗是非常少的，无论是客户端还是服务器

I gues zookeeper too heavy, he meant to use zookeeper to develop too hard.
- zk actual consumption of resources is very small, whether it is client or server
出现这个问题时，provider 是正常的，通过 dubbo admin 可以看到。而且，将这个 provider先禁用，再启用，consumer 端就恢复了，不再报错。猜测问题出在 provider 注册服务后，consumer 端没有收到通知而未刷新本地缓存的服务列表。

问题已解决。把dubbo的版本降到2.5.6就可以了。
简单分析：2.5.7 在/com/alibaba/dubbo/remoting/zookeeper/zkclient包里增加了ZkClientWrapper类，用来异步获取zookeeper连接，设置了30000ms超时，但是mac上30000ms还是连不上zookeeper，所以后来调的时候就报错了

@kirayunfei 1. 应该不需要加锁，判断超时的逻辑是单独一个线程在执行检查
2.整个业务执行的逻辑应该不是在netty的io线程内，而是后面的业务的客户端业务线程，io线程只负责底层的数据收发，连接管理

Please use `@EnableDubbo` and add `@PropertySource("your-config.properties")`, and

`your-config.properties` content:

```properties
dubbo.consumer.check=false
```

or wait for [`dubbo-spring-boot-starter`](https://github.com/dubbo/dubbo-spring-boot-project) that will be release soon.
Did you try  to use `@DubboComponentScan`?
